name: mecab-web
description: This project compiles mecab to WebAssembly, using Emscripten.   Refers to [fasiha's mecab-emscripten](https://github.com/fasiha/mecab-emscripten), which targeted JS.   Uses [https://github.com/WaniKani/WanaKana](WanaKana) (MIT license) for transliteration, additional tokenization, and classification.
author: Alex Birch
